head.title: Even Without Peacocks, Apartments Are a Gem

hedline.hl1: Even Without Peacocks, Apartments Are a Gem

abstract.p: Friends of Terra Cotta president Susan Tunick letter on July 16 article holds that Ambassador Apartments on Staten Island, even without peacock doors, is worthy of landmark designation (S)

block.p: Re ''The Seemingly Endless Mystery of the Missing Peacocks'' (July 16), about the Ambassador Apartments on Staten Island, readers should know that even without the return of the peacock doors this building is worthy of New York City Landmark designation. The building's unique polychrome Deco terra cotta is fabulous. It was chosen by both the Friends of Terra Cotta and Princeton Architectural Press as the structure to feature for each organization's 1999 holiday card.
SUSAN TUNICK President, Friends of Terra Cotta
